description: Searching for a campsite? The AA has over one hundred years of experience in seeking out, assessing and recommending accommodation. The 2011 AA Caravan & Camping Guide app features over 850 recommended and inspected campsites located across England, Scotland and Wales, from fields, forests and moors to lakes and coastal regions.  Campsites have been awarded an AA rating by a professional AA inspector. Entries may include a detailed description, price information, images, telephone numbers, website addresses and more.  The 2011 AA Caravan & Camping Guide app includes the following main features: Over 850 recommended Caravan and Camping sites in England, Scotland and Wales - Fully installed content - AA graded campsites - Search options e.g. search for a 2 star Caravan and Camping site - Price information - Detailed descriptions - Telephone numbers - Search around your current location - Search around a location of your choice - Locations displayed on bing maps - Links to websites
